translations.translation: We shall call the guards of Hell.
We too shall summon the guards of Hell.
and We too will call the stern and angry keepers of hell.
We will now call the guards!
We will call out the guards of Hell!
We too would summon the braves of the army.
We shall call on the guards of Hell.
We will call the guards of hell.
We shall summon the guards of Hell.
We also shall call the infernal guards.
We [too] shall call the keepers of hell.
We will call on the angels of punishment (to deal with him)!
We will call the guards of Hell (to deal with him)!
We, will call the Zabania (the harsh angels of Hell).
We will call the angels of Hell.

[96:18] We shall call the Zabāniya, the grim stern angels to destroy him, as [stated] in the hadīth, ‘Had he called his council [of henchmen] together, the Zabāniya would have seized him right before his own eyes!’.
(We will call the guards of hell) i.e. the keepers of hell.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: { سَنَدْعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ } معناه المَلائكةُ، والزَّبانيةُ: الشُّرطُ
